settings.title:
Experience Smooth, Flawless Without
Pain Skin with PROMED Hair Removal
settings.text: Your Ultimate Guide to IPL Hair Removal – Safe, Effective, and Long-Lasting Results at Home

settings.block_des: IPL, or Intense Pulsed Light, is an innovative technology that emits a concentrated light through the skin. Thanks to the sapphire ice-cooling system, a protective stone at the heart of PROMED  technology.

settings.block_title: The Advantages of Sapphire Ice Cooling Technology
settings.block_des:
Intense Pulsed Light is absorbed by the melanin present in the hair follicle, leading to
its gradual degradation over the course of the sessions. This effective action limits hair
growth and slows down regrowth. Thanks to the Sapphire Ice-Cooling technology, the skin receives optimal protection, minimizing any risk of irritation while ensuring maximum comfort
during the treatment. This combination guarantees lasting results and a pleasant experience.

settings.block_title: Why are hair and skin color important.
settings.block_des:
IPL technology works best on dark hair and light skin tones. It is less effective on
blonde, gray and red hair and is not suitable for very dark skin.

settings.image_alt: Pro Med IPL epilator with Hair  Remover technology
settings.description: Step 1 : Prepare your skin with a scrub.

settings.image_alt: Pro Med IPL epilator with Hair  Remover technology
settings.description: Step 2 : Shave the area in question, then dry your skin.

settings.image_alt: Pro Med IPL epilator with Hair  Remover technology
settings.description: Step 3 : Protect your eyes with safety goggles while using the device.

settings.image_alt: Pro Med IPL epilator with Hair  Remover technology
settings.description: Step 4 : Plug the Promed device into the switch and turn it on. Press the desired intensity mode according to the area or areas to be treated.

settings.image_alt: Pro Med IPL epilator with Hair  Remover technology
settings.description: Step 5 : Place the device on the area to be treated and position it vertically. The light from the hair removal sensor will turn on upon contact with the skin. Press the flash button to initiate the hair removal process, then let the device glide over your skin using the automatic mode.

settings.image_alt: Pro Med IPL epilator with Hair  Remover technology
settings.description: Step 6 : Once you have finished using the device, turn it off and wipe the tip of the epilator with a dry cloth after each use to remove any skin or hair residue that may accumulate. Feel free to finish with a moisturizing cream on your skin. Avoid any sun exposure during the usage period.

settings.header_text: Expert hair removal at home. Step by step.

settings.block_title: Place the device on the area to be treated and position it vertically. The light from the hair removal sensor will turn on upon contact with the skin. Press the flash button to initiate the hair removal process, then let the device glide over your skin using the automatic mode.

Once you have finished using the device, turn it off and wipe the tip of the epilator with a dry cloth after each use to remove any skin or hair residue that may accumulate. Feel free to finish with a moisturizing cream on your skin. Avoid any sun exposure during the usage period.

settings.title: The main benefits
settings.subtitle: WITH SAPPHIRE ICE-COOLING TECHNOLOGY
settings.imagh1: Enhanced Skin Contact AreaOptimized skin contact surface
settings.imagh2: Skin temperature maintained between 2° and 7° when flashes are active, which ice cooling system
settings.imagh3: Facilitated absorption of light by melanin up to the hair root

settings.title: Specificities
settings.imagh1: High hardness of sapphire: 9/10 on the Mohs scale

settings.heading: Full body hair removal in just a few minutes

settings.block_content: Thick and noticeable hair with a rough texture.
Hair is visibly reduced, appearing lighter and thinner, though still slightly present.
Achieve smooth, soft, and hair-free skin with continued use.
See noticeable results with up to an 85% reduction in hair growth within just 4 weeks of consistent use.
Enjoy silky, smooth skin for months after treatment. Regular use ensures long-lasting softness with minimal regrowth.

settings.title_collection: A Modern Approach to Hair Removal
settings.block_content: Transform your beauty routine with the power of IPL technology. Use 2-3 times a week during the first month, then as needed based on your hair type and regrowth.

settings.heading: Proven Results for Smooth, Hair-Free Skin

settings.title: All the accreditations need to guarantee both the quality of our products and your safety
settings.subtitle: CERTIFICATIONS
settings.text: Our gadgets are European certified, comply with ISO 13485, and have undergone extensive testing by national and international bodies to guarantee safety and performance. Pro-med can provide you of the highest protection because it has also earned the Skin Health Alliance certification. More than 30 international certifications have been granted to us, confirming the safety of using our products at home. Every product also has a distinct serial number that serves as a traceability indicator.

settings.block_des: Pro-med technology has been the outcome of 44 researchers working together for more than ten years. The research and development of our goods is what drives our everyday innovation spirit. This inhibits the growth of new hair and delays its renewal. The skin is fully protected by Sapphire Ice-cooling's cooling technology.
